pages.text: A byproduct of Wraith Corpses, a very delicious protein. As a dark wizard who wants to take a bite of almost everything, you shouldn't disdain this rare delicacy.

pages.title: Rotten Corpse Maggot Feast
pages.text: Can be taken three times, grants the consumer Nourishment (10 minutes)$(br)$(4)After consumption, there is a 25% chance to immediately spawn a$(4) Wraith Corpse
